column5: In general, absolutely. I think we're collectively more prone to gaslighting, manipulation, shame, and a thousand other negatives. It doesn't mean all people dealing with the same mental illness will suffer the same date, but I think we are at a higher than average likelihood. I've had partners in the past work repeatedly at convincing me that things were a facet of my hallucinations or delusions, only to discover months down the line I had been right all along.
